title: New: Yawwn – Partisan
body:
This is how you announce yourself in 2018 as a pop-rock act.

London five piece **Yawwn** release their debut single on Saturday, alongside playing the first night of their own CLUB YAWWN at their rehearsal space in Wimbledon, and it’s one of the most impressive debuts I’ve heard in quite some time. Big verses, even bigger choruses; at points _Partisan_ reminds me of Franz Ferdinand at their hooky, festival ready best. Check it out below.
